title: "Katonic AI to help Japanese businesses securely embrace the power of Generative AI"
excerpt: "Katonic.ai, an Australian AI company, marked its entry into the Japanese market with the launch of its no-code Generative AI Platform in Japanese. The Katonic Generative AI Platform enables large and small businesses to rapidly harness the transformative power of Generative AI without the traditional risks of data security or data hallucinations."
